benchmark_details.name: 20 Structural Analysis Word Problems (SAWPs)
benchmark_details.overview: The benchmark comprises 20 structurally focused word problems designed to evaluate the performance of large language models (LLMs) in generating finite element analysis scripts and solving structural analysis tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the capability of LLMs in solving structural analysis problems based on natural language input.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Limited size of the dataset and manual design process may restrict generalizability.

data.source: Custom generated dataset of structural analysis problems.
data.annotation: Manually curated with corresponding ground-truth solutions.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated by comparing model outputs to ground-truth solutions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in correctly generating solutions.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-4o achieved 100% accuracy on the benchmark.
methodology.validation: Validation through comparative analysis of different LLMs.
